content.description_html: Index of data sources. Download source profiles. See the JUMP Hub for more information. The latest version of this page can be found here. For case-insensitive search replace the '=' operator with 'like'.
content.title: COMPOUND Gallery

columns.Gene/Compound: Chemical or genetic perturbation. If genetic (overexpression or knock-out) it is the NCBI gene symbol. If it is a chemical perturbation this is the InChiKey.
columns.JCP2022 ID: JUMP internal id. This identifier is unique for any given reagent for a genetic or chemical perturbation across all three datasets (ORF, CRISPR and compounds) and is only repeated for biological replicates.
columns.Source: Identifier of the partner that produced the data numbered between 1 and 15.
columns.Well: Identifier of the well. Generally 384-well plates, ranging from A01 to P24.
columns.Site X: Identifier of the Field of View (FoV). Ranging from 0 to 9 (depending on the dataset).
